mn78:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn78:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena uggahamano paribbajako samanamundikaputto samayappavadake tindukacire ekasalake mallikaya arame pativasati mahatiya paribbajakaparisaya saddhim pancamattehi paribbajakasatehi.
mn78:2.1: Atha kho pancakango thapati savatthiya nikkhami diva divassa bhagavantam dassanaya.
mn78:2.7: Yannunaham yena samayappavadako tindukaciro ekasalako mallikaya aramo yena uggahamano paribbajako samanamundikaputto tenupasankameyyan”ti.
mn78:2.8: Atha kho pancakango thapati yena samayappavadako tindukaciro ekasalako mallikaya aramo yena uggahamano paribbajako samanamundikaputto tenupasankami.
mn78:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena uggahamano paribbajako samanamundikaputto mahatiya paribbajakaparisaya saddhim nisinno hoti unnadiniya uccasaddamahasaddaya anekavihitam tiracchanakatham kathentiya, seyyathidam—
mn78:3.2: rajakatham corakatham mahamattakatham senakatham bhayakatham yuddhakatham annakatham panakatham vatthakatham sayanakatham malakatham gandhakatham natikatham yanakatham gamakatham nigamakatham nagarakatham janapadakatham itthikatham surakatham visikhakatham kumbhatthanakatham pubbapetakatham nanattakatham lokakkhayikam samuddakkhayikam itibhavabhavakatham iti va.
mn78:3.3: Addasa kho uggahamano paribbajako samanamundikaputto pancakangam thapatim duratova agacchantam.
mn78:3.6: ayam samanassa gotamassa savako agacchati pancakango thapati.
mn78:3.7: Yavata kho pana samanassa gotamassa savaka gihi odatavasana savatthiyam pativasanti ayam tesam annataro pancakango thapati.
mn78:3.8: Appasaddakama kho pana te ayasmanto appasaddavinita appasaddassa vannavadino;
mn78:3.9: appeva nama appasaddam parisam viditva upasankamitabbam manneyya”ti.
mn78:3.10: Atha kho te paribbajaka tunhi ahesum.
mn78:4.1: Atha kho pancakango thapati yena uggahamano paribbajako samanamundikaputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva uggahamanena paribbajakena samanamundikaputtena saddhim sammodi.
mn78:4.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho pancakangam thapatim uggahamano paribbajako samanamundikaputto etadavoca:
mn78:5.1: “catuhi kho aham, gahapati, dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi sampannakusalam paramakusalam uttamapattipattam samanam ayojjham.
mn78:5.3: Idha, gahapati, na kayena papakammam karoti, na papakam vacam bhasati, na papakam sankappam sankappeti, na papakam ajivam ajivati—
mn78:5.4: imehi kho aham, gahapati, catuhi dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi sampannakusalam paramakusalam uttamapattipattam samanam ayojjhan”ti.
mn78:6.1: Atha kho pancakango thapati uggahamanassa paribbajakassa samanamundikaputtassa bhasitam neva abhinandi nappatikkosi.
mn78:7.1: Atha kho pancakango thapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn78:7.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho pancakango thapati yavatako ahosi uggahamanena paribbajakena samanamundikaputtena saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
mn78:8.1: Evam vutte, bhagava pancakangam thapatim etadavoca:
mn78:8.2: “evam sante kho, thapati, daharo kumaro mando uttanaseyyako sampannakusalo bhavissati paramakusalo uttamapattipatto samano ayojjho, yatha uggahamanassa paribbajakassa samanamundikaputtassa vacanam.
mn78:8.3: Daharassa hi, thapati, kumarassa mandassa uttanaseyyakassa kayotipi na hoti, kuto pana kayena papakammam karissati, annatra phanditamatta.
mn78:8.4: Daharassa hi, thapati, kumarassa mandassa uttanaseyyakassa vacatipi na hoti, kuto pana papakam vacam bhasissati, annatra roditamatta.
mn78:8.5: Daharassa hi, thapati, kumarassa mandassa uttanaseyyakassa sankappotipi na hoti, kuto pana papakam sankappam sankappissati, annatra vikujitamatta.
mn78:8.6: Daharassa hi, thapati, kumarassa mandassa uttanaseyyakassa ajivotipi na hoti, kuto pana papakam ajivam ajivissati, annatra matuthanna.
mn78:8.7: Evam sante kho, thapati, daharo kumaro mando uttanaseyyako sampannakusalo bhavissati paramakusalo uttamapattipatto samano ayojjho, yatha uggahamanassa paribbajakassa samanamundikaputtassa vacanam.
mn78:8.8: Catuhi kho aham, thapati, dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi na ceva sampannakusalam na paramakusalam na uttamapattipattam samanam ayojjham, api cimam daharam kumaram mandam uttanaseyyakam samadhigayha titthati.
mn78:8.10: Idha, thapati, na kayena papakammam karoti, na papakam vacam bhasati, na papakam sankappam sankappeti, na papakam ajivam ajivati—
mn78:8.11: imehi kho aham, thapati, catuhi dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi na ceva sampannakusalam na paramakusalam na uttamapattipattam samanam ayojjham, api cimam daharam kumaram mandam uttanaseyyakam samadhigayha titthati.
mn78:9.1: Dasahi kho aham, thapati, dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi sampannakusalam paramakusalam uttamapattipattam samanam ayojjham.
mn78:9.8: Evam patipanno akusalanam silanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti;
mn78:9.16: Evam patipanno kusalanam silanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti;
mn78:9.24: Evam patipanno akusalanam sankappanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti;
mn78:9.32: Evam patipanno kusalanam sankappanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti;
mn78:10.2: Akusalam kayakammam, akusalam vacikammam, papako ajivo—
mn78:10.4: Ime ca, thapati, akusala sila kimsamutthana?
mn78:10.9: Yam cittam saragam sadosam samoham, itosamutthana akusala sila.
mn78:10.10: Ime ca, thapati, akusala sila kuhim aparisesa nirujjhanti?
mn78:10.12: Idha, thapati, bhikkhu kayaduccaritam pahaya kayasucaritam bhaveti, vaciduccaritam pahaya vacisucaritam bhaveti, manoduccaritam pahaya manosucaritam bhaveti, micchajivam pahaya sammajivena jivitam kappeti—
mn78:10.14: Katham patipanno, thapati, akusalanam silanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti?
mn78:10.15: Idha, thapati, bhikkhu anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
mn78:10.16: uppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
mn78:10.17: anuppannanam kusalanam dhammanam uppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
mn78:10.18: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
mn78:10.19: Evam patipanno kho, thapati, akusalanam silanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
mn78:11.2: Kusalam kayakammam, kusalam vacikammam, ajivaparisuddhampi kho aham, thapati, silasmim vadami.
mn78:11.4: Ime ca, thapati, kusala sila kimsamutthana?
mn78:11.9: Yam cittam vitaragam vitadosam vitamoham, itosamutthana kusala sila.
mn78:11.10: Ime ca, thapati, kusala sila kuhim aparisesa nirujjhanti?
mn78:11.12: Idha, thapati, bhikkhu silava hoti no ca silamayo,
mn78:11.13: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati; yatthassa te kusala sila aparisesa nirujjhanti.
mn78:11.14: Katham patipanno ca, thapati, kusalanam silanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti?
mn78:11.15: Idha, thapati, bhikkhu anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
mn78:11.18: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
mn78:11.19: Evam patipanno kho, thapati, kusalanam silanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
mn78:12.4: Ime ca, thapati, akusala sankappa kimsamutthana?
mn78:12.11: Ime ca, thapati, akusala sankappa kuhim aparisesa nirujjhanti?
mn78:12.13: Idha, thapati, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati;
mn78:12.15: Katham patipanno ca, thapati, akusalanam sankappanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti?
mn78:12.16: Idha, thapati, bhikkhu anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
mn78:12.19: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
mn78:12.20: Evam patipanno kho, thapati, akusalanam sankappanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
mn78:13.4: Ime ca, thapati, kusala sankappa kimsamutthana?
mn78:13.11: Ime ca, thapati, kusala sankappa kuhim aparisesa nirujjhanti?
mn78:13.13: Idha, thapati, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati;
mn78:13.15: Katham patipanno ca, thapati, kusalanam sankappanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti?
mn78:13.16: Idha, thapati, bhikkhu anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
mn78:13.19: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
mn78:13.20: Evam patipanno kho, thapati, kusalanam sankappanam nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
mn78:14.1: Katamehi caham, thapati, dasahi dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi sampannakusalam paramakusalam uttamapattipattam samanam ayojjham?
mn78:14.2: Idha, thapati, bhikkhu asekhaya sammaditthiya samannagato hoti, asekhena sammasankappena samannagato hoti, asekhaya sammavacaya samannagato hoti, asekhena sammakammantena samannagato hoti, asekhena sammaajivena samannagato hoti, asekhena sammavayamena samannagato hoti, asekhaya sammasatiya samannagato hoti, asekhena sammasamadhina samannagato hoti, asekhena sammananena samannagato hoti, asekhaya sammavimuttiya samannagato hoti—
mn78:14.3: imehi kho aham, thapati, dasahi dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi sampannakusalam paramakusalam uttamapattipattam samanam ayojjhan”ti.
mn78:14.5: Attamano pancakango thapati bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
